p.d: No Bull documents the classic 1996 Ballbreaker tour, recorded at the Plaza De Toros De Las Ventas (Madrid, Spain). The show, involving a crane, a large model of "Rosie" and a finale with half a dozen blazing cannons, features 20 live tracks spanning their then 23-year career. It features 4 tracks from Ballbreaker album, as well as other classic songs by the band.
